tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: The first node we will learn about today is the Dashboard. A Dashboard helps us stay organized.

paragraphs.text: To get us started,  I want you to get a little more comfortable with how the Charting Space is set up.
Expand the Charting Space node and take a look at the Dashboards underneath. What do you notice?
Thatâ€™s right! There is one Dashboard set up for Backtesting and one set up for Live Trading. Dashboards are a convenient way to group charts according to type.
